title: Does Texas HB 196 ‘Repeal’ The Castle Doctrine?
subtitle: The bill does seem to add a "duty to retreat" clause to the defense of self, or of another person. But what about self-defense on one's own property?
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: HB 196, proposed by Texas state Rep. Terry Meza, would repeal a legal principle known as the castle doctrine.
